text: Chamikara Edirisinghe (born 4 April 1991) is a Sri Lankan cricketer. He made his first-class debut for Kurunegala Youth Cricket Club in the 2011–12 Premier Trophy on 20 January 2012. On 4 January 2019, bowling for Saracens Sports Club against Colombo Cricket Club in the 2018–19 Premier League Tournament, Edirisinghe took 9 wickets for 87 runs in the first innings of the match. He was the leading wicket-taker for Saracens Sports Club in the tournament, with 52 dismissals in ten matches. He signed with Chorley Cricket Club to play cricket in England in the 2019 season. In March 2019, he was named in Galle's squad for the 2019 Super Provincial One Day Tournament. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Sri Lankan cricketers Category:Kurunegala Youth Cricket Club cricketers Category:Monaragala District cricketers Category:Saracens Sports Club cricketers Category:People from North Western Province, Sri Lanka
title: Chamikara Edirisinghe
